context.description: Use the New BigInsights Project wizard to create a new BigInsights project for text analytics, MapReduce, JAQL, or Hive.

Your BigInsights project is associated with a BigInsights container that contains libraries that are used when developing Text Analytics, MapReduce, Jaql, or Hive programs. If you want to run or publish a program on a BigInsights Server, the version of the BigInsights libraries must match the BigInsights server. For example for BigInsights server version 1.3.0.1., select BigInsights libraries version “BigInsights V1.3.0.1.
Use the BigInsights Server wizard to create a connection to a BigInsights server.
Use the Import Applications wizard to

Use the BigInsights Server View to create, update, or delete BigInsights (BI) servers. From any of the BI servers listed in the BI server view, you can also perform actions such as launching web console pages (Files page, Jobs View, Applications view) and opening the Jaql shell Linux only).
Use the BigInsights pages to specify preferences that are related to using BigInsights. Expand the tree to see more preferences.
